feed.title: Woolly Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.1.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5057
  • Update dependency @electron/notarize to v2.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5064
  • Update dependency next to v14.2.15 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5065
  • Update dependency sass to v1.79.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5066
  • Update dependency eslint to v9.12.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5067
  • Update dependency react-intl to v6.7.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5068
  • Update dependency tailwindcss to v3.4.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5073
  • Update typescript-eslint monorepo to v8.8.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5074
  • Update dependency @types/node to v20.16.11 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5075
  • Update dependency eslint-plugin-react to v7.37.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5077
  • Update dependency megalodon to v10.0.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5078
  • Update dependency @babel/runtime-corejs3 to v7.25.7 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5079
  • Update dependency sanitize-html to v2.13.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5080
  • Update dependency node to v20.18.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5081
  • Update dependency typescript to v5.6.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5082
  • refs #4798 Add FollowRequests menu by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5088
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5089
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5085
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5090

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/compare/v6.1.6...v6.1.7

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.1.8
entry.content:

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.2.0
entry.content:
